problem_text:
Is there a torsion-free group which is finitely presented in the quasi-variety of torsion-free groups but not finitely presentable in the variety of all groups?
O. V. Belegradek
answer: Yes, there is (A. I. Budkin, Siberian Electron. Math. Rep., 14 (2017), 937–945, http://semr.math.nsc.ru).
